item.title: Materiale utile
item.description: Sezione Extra Materiale Utile Pycon 2022: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2Uw4_HvXqvYeXy8ab7iRHjA-9HiYhRQl Pycon 2021: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2Uw4_HvXqvYk1Y5P8kryoyd83L_0Uk5K Pycon 2020: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2Uw4_HvXqvbpFquYIE57BEAqkQWk-iFg Best Python 2020: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tqUe0gcfqAU&list=PLCA4Z3rehf5nDNRqo4sLC_8KgU0tymlge&ab_channel=PyConUS Modern Python Developer’s toolkit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WkUBx3g2QfQ&ab_channel=PyConUS Modern Python Developer’s toolkit (resources): https://pycon.switowski.com/ Install, Uninstall and manage multiple versions of python on a mac: https://www.ianmaddaus.com/post/manage-multiple-versions-python-mac/ 5 Python Tricks da usare: https://towardsdatascience.com/5-python-tricks-you-should-start-using-in-2021-1084af21c2f2 Medium informations and blogs to look at: https://betterprogramming.pub/ https://medium.com/analytics-vidhya https://towardsdatascience.com/ Jetbrains Dev Ecosystem 2020: https://www.jetbrains.com/lp/devecosystem-2020/python/ State of 2020 language: https://fwdays.com/en/event/python-fwdays-conference/review/python-2020-the-state-of-the-language Fase pi√π discorsiva
